variation.name: EssenceAliasDuplicate
variation.description: 392.02 Valid example of essence-alias attribute using duplicate.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDuplicateNoEssence
variation.description: 392.03 Valid example of essence-alias attribute using duplicate. No copy happens.

variation.name: EssenceAliasReverse
variation.description: 392.04 Valid example of essence-alias attribute not to apply reverse direction.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentScopeValid
variation.description: 392.07 Valid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset has items set to essence-alias, but Essence item and alias items are located in other tuples, so even if these values are not identical but it is still valid.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentScopeInValid
variation.description: 392.08 Invalid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset has items set to essence-alias, but Essence item and alias items in same tuple are not identical but other essence item in other tuple is identical. So scoping is wrong, it is invalid.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentScopeValidWithValue
variation.description: 392.09 Valid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset has items set to essence-alias, One Essence item in same tuple with alias is identical and other essence items located in other tuples is no identical, By scoping, it is valid.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentUnit
variation.description: 392.10 Invalid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset has numeric items set to essence-alias, but Essence item and alias item have different units. so it is invalid.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentContext
variation.description: 392.11 Valid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset has items set to essence-alias, but Essence item and alias item are different values and units. so it is valid.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentType
variation.description: 392.12 Invalid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset make an essence-alias relation between two different item type.

variation.name: EssenceAliasDifferentPeriodType
variation.description: 392.13 Invalid example of essence-alias attribute. This testset make an essence-alias relation between two items which are different period type.

variation.name: EssenceAliasNonNumericValid
variation.description: 392.14 Valid example of essence-alias attribute regarding nonNumericContext.

variation.name: EssenceAliasNonNumericInValid
variation.description: 392.15 invalid example of essence-alias attribute regarding nonNumericContext.

variation.name: EssenceAliasNonNumericTupleValid
variation.description: 392.16 Valid example of essence-alias attribute regarding nonNumericContext.

variation.name: EssenceAliasNonNumericTupleInValid
variation.description: 392.17 invalid example of essence-alias attribute regarding nonNumericContext.
